Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone,

I'm sorry if this is the wrong section, but I'm just curious if someone wanted to go about coding there own game like KSP how would you go about doing something like that, and where would you get started learning how to do that assuming you have no prior programming experience.
When you say "like KSP" do you mean on the same scale as KSP (large game,, several devs), or just space themed?
Hey awesome! I've been thinking the same thing! Would you be open to collaboration?
